item.title: FBI fires agents who kneeled at protest after George Floyd's death: Sources
item.description: The FBI has fired a group of agents who kneeled at a protest in Washington, D.C., in the wake of George Floyd's death in 2020, according to sources.

item.title: Comey charge involves sharing of info about Hillary Clinton-related probe: Sources
